sentences.en: Despite being a big star, she's very approachable.

sentences.en: Mr Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.

sentences.en: Solitary life shirt little pity, charity, his modesty generous, approachable.

sentences.en: The head teacher is very approachable.
